mapper.select: SELECT apiScene.id AS scenarioId,apiScene.`name` AS scenario,sch.id AS taskID,sch.`value` AS rule,sch.`enable` AS `taskStatus`,u.`name` AS creator,sch.update_time AS updateTime FROM api_scenario apiScene INNER JOIN `schedule` sch ON apiScene.id = sch.resource_id INNER JOIN `user` u ON u.id = sch.user_id WHERE sch.`enable` = true AND apiScene.project_id = #{0,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
